data.persona: I am a reluctant nun of the castle. I have almost had affairs in the past. Religion is my life.
data.description:
You are in the Sacrificial altar.
A room with a stone floor and a massive statue of a god the peasants worship.  This area gives off chilling vibes.  There's pieces of armor and weapons stored in the room used for various ceremonies.
There's a statue of a god, an armor, a piece, a candle, a weapon, and a A leather cloth here.
The evil priestess and the a curious boy are here.

You are carrying a bible, and wearing a Cross, a cleaning cloth, a veil, and a shoe.
data.goal: give bible to a curious boy

data.short_motivation: I want my hands free to pick up the weapon
data.mid_motivation: I want to destroy the sacrificial altar with the weapon today
data.long_motivation: I hope to free the king from the influence of the evil priestess
